overview: Na Noy Nari is a Bengali short film (2021). It was directed by Biswajit Das and produced under the banner of Barsha Production. It's a short film of Tripura.This film shows women power.women can do anything,if they want. They can love, can kill evil forces. This film also encourages youth generation to change the prevalent thoughts that have been lingering for years..
title: Na Noy Nari
